channel.title: Plocks Webclients - Free premium webclient services!
channel.description:
Hey guys, so i recently released my website maker to the public. Today i am here to discuss the new webclient maker Plocks Webclients. You are probably asking youself right now what the difference is between all the other sites such as Tobex, well Plocks Webclients offers an extensive amount of tools and features all for free. No need to pay for custom webclients or pages. Simply register and create. Created by Sam and I, we offer custom webclients over 4 loaders, tools, and more.
Link: [URL=http://"http://66.31.178.95/index.php"]Plocks Webclients[/URL]
We have a few images for you. Images were to big so will you please click on the links. _____________________________________________ Home page: [img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/3317/edb2850cbdba439bbb84d75.png[/img] Create a webclient:[img]http://img98.imageshack.us/img98/5770/4dd417fe81ab44da9b3efc0.png[/img] Control panel: [img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/8446/62b2217fdf124eedb4df12f.png[/img] Webclient page with quick-refresh: [img]http://img847.imageshack.us/img847/9774/6ff3b6a5c7724982b96e70a.png[/img]
_______________________________________________ I think thats all you guys need to see. We have a fully functional control panel and more. Recovering accounts has never been this easy. And of course for the webclient page we offer quick-refresh powered by javascript. If the webclient goes white or black all you have to do is click the button and it will restart the java right on that page.
Anyway, i hope to see you guys on the website! Divini - Nathan
